title: Poison Ivy
creator_credit: Richard James Martin, Jack Long and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Sixty-six-year old Ivy Granstron jogs, skis, bowls and gardens and does carpentry work. Sometimes she walks into a wall. Due to insufficient care at birth, she has only 4 1/2 vision, but she doesn’t let blindness interfere with her life. She practices the art of ‘mind over eyes’.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard James Martin, Jack Long and ONF | NFB
